channel.title: A note from CodeUsa
channel.description:
Hello i may not be one of the top 'posters here' but why is it if. A member of this fourm tells a moderator or admin off they are banned? because has you may know Codeusa was banned last night for no reason and i would like to know why he was really what did he do that was so wrong? well i say sign for a un ban because all he did was try and help this community and treated every member has a equal and. He gets banned all he liked to do is post and now he can't because his favorite banned him so sign if you want codeusa back with
/sign
Please bring codeusa back he was going to release ajscape unleased to moparscape but now he is not because of this so sign please bring him back. we know the moderators will all out ban and mute and admin do not care because they think they run the place but try and bring him back.
Ajscape unleased was this
Other who where warned and punished because moderators don't like what we have to say
matrix pride(moderation) for nothing
reeper X warned for spam? i have read all his post where is the spam
written blade moderation show me the spam?
and Jme posted gay spam and DID NOT GET NOTHING!!! codeusa for ban = SPAM jme posted that = spam
matrix pride = moderatoed for taking up for someone

item.title: A note from CodeUsa
item.dc:creator: @psyhoman psyhoman
item.description:
@psyhoman wrote:

You want him unbanned just because he was going to release ajscape ? LOL
w/e I don’t think this will help, it may even worse his chances…
I was going to un-ban him just because he is my friend

Read full topic

item.title: A note from CodeUsa
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Tbh, codeusa was one of the biggest spammers ive seen here in a while. He also had a tendancy to argue with everything, instead of working with it. As far as I see, he deserved the ban. If he told a mod off, he probably flamed the mod to hell and back. And if I am not mistaken isn’t that against the rules now? And this is spam also. Your walking down codeusa’s path. Please, before it’s to late, take the next exit off that path.

Read full topic

item.title: A note from CodeUsa
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

does it look like i care? i could get banned whatever, i dont really give a shit, all the good people left.

Read full topic

item.title: A note from CodeUsa
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

Never gonna win an argument with someone, that has the power to ban you.

Read full topic

item.title: A note from CodeUsa
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Okay, but you might get warned for this

Read full topic

item.title: A note from CodeUsa
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:3, topic:225836”]Your codeusa, you have dislexia so you spell “AS” as “HAS” and I see that.

Or, you can be another one of his dislexic friends.[/quote]He isn’t codeusa. I told yz off and nothing happened to me.

Read full topic

item.title: A note from CodeUsa
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

i just posted this on request…i didnt write it

Read full topic

item.title: A note from CodeUsa
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Your codeusa, you have dislexia so you spell “AS” as “HAS” and I see that.

Or, you can be another one of his dislexic friends.

Read full topic

item.title: A note from CodeUsa
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Why don’t you just talk to staff on IRC instead? :/, You’re an idiot for posting in the wrong section [besides the fact there is no section for “petitions”] about something that you obviously ignored (what the mod’s said and what the sticky says).

Read full topic
